Title: Geothermal Escapism
Plot: Abed plans an epic going-away party as Troy prepares to leave Greendale; a fun game transforms into a high-stakes competition.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: LeVar Burton, Jonathan Banks, John Oliver, Richard Erdman, Charley Koontz, Erik Charles Nielsen, Luke Youngblood, Danielle Kaplowitz, Dino Stamatopoulos
